generic.create_fail: Sorry for the inconvenience, the action could not be completed please try again.
generic.exclusivity_fail: There was more than 1 item identified so the action requested could not be completed
generic.hard_delete_fail: Sorry for the inconvenience, the action could not be completed please try again.
generic.internal: Sorry for the inconvenience, the action could not be completed please try again.
generic.invalid_csrf: We apologize for the inconvenience but our system could not verify all of the necessary information we need to keep your connection secure. You may need to log out, delete your cookies, and clear your cache.
generic.orphaning_fail: Sorry for the inconvenience, the action could not be completed please try again.
generic.no_action_permission: You do not have permission to perform this action. Please contact the owner to ask for permission. If you are the file owner and are getting this message, please contact Support and let us know.
generic.no_archive_selected: Please select a permanent archive and then retry
generic.no_object_permission: You do not have permission to access this item. Please contact the owner to ask for permission. If you are the file owner and are getting this message, please contact Support and let us know.
generic.soft_delete_fail: We could not delete the item you selected. Please try again or contact Support.
generic.update_fail: We could not update the item you selected. Please try again or contact Support.

presigned.url: The upload could not be started

imagick.read_image_blob: The image format wasn't something we expected

invite.already_invited: This email address has already been invited. Thank you for sharing interest.
invite.already_registered: This email is already associated with an account and doesn't require an invitation.

profile_item.no_delete: You are not allowed to delete this profile item

pr.no_link: This account does not have access to the requested Permanent Archive

apps.description: Welcome to apps section. This is where you can manage all the 3rd party apps you have connected with.

private.description: Welcome to My Files, a place to organize all the files you have uploaded. If you would like to share something with someone, you can do it by selecting that item and choosing the desired user and their access permission.

public.description: This is your Public folder. Place files and information in this folder that you would want everyone in the world to be able to see for eternity. Do not put information here that you do not want publicly available right away. Tell your life story. Add the things you would like to share and preserve.

shares.description: Welcome to your archive shared section. This is where you can share files and folders between archives.You can create shared folders that allow multiple people to own, contribute and curate together.

process.thumbnail_redo_before: Need to regenerate thumbnail before work
process.thumbnail_redo_during: Need to regenerate thumbnail during work
process.thumbnail_redo_after: Need to regenerate thumbnail after work

encryption.client_side: File was encrypted on the client

action.md5: Running the bit checker for md5 inconsistencies

auth.need_email_and_phone: We haven't received both your email and phone verification. We need you to verify both before you can login. Click here to resend validation.
auth.need_email: We haven't received your email verification. We need you to verify your email before you can login. Click here to resend validation.
auth.need_phone: We haven't received your phone number verification. We need you to verify your phone number before you can login. Click here to resend validation.
auth.verified: We have verified your contact information.
auth.unverified: We need to verify your contact information.

account_allocation.accepted: Transfer completed space went to toAccount.

account_allocation.expired: Transfer expired space went back to original account.

billing_transfer.ownership_revoke: Transfer ownership of Account was revoked

folder.new: The folder is new and needs to be processed
folder.moving: This folder or some of it's contents are being moved and cannot be accessed until the move is completed.
folder.copying: This folder or some of it's contents are being copied and cannot be access until the copy is completed.

generic.error: This item has an error, seek administrator help.

generic.manual_review: This item needs to be investigated manually to determine what is wrong.

notification.error: There was an error during directive processing.
notification.new: This notification just came into being.

promo.invalid: There was an error during directive processing.

record.needs_processing: This file needs image processing and conversion

record.only_meta: Only meta data set at this point needs image.

record.moving: This file is being moved and cannot be accessed until the move is completed.
record.copying: This file is being copied and cannot be accessed until the copy is completed.

report.error: There was an error during processing.

report.unprocessed: This report needs to be processed.

timezone.deprecated: The timezone is no longer used

zip.new: New Zip, needs to be processed

sort.display_date_asc: Sort by date, ascending order - oldest date first.
sort.display_date_desc: Sort by date, descending order - most recent date first.
sort.created_date_asc: Sort by the date the item was uploaded, ascending order - oldest date first.
sort.created_date_desc: Sort by the date the item was uploaded, descending order - most recent date first.
sort.alphabetical_asc: Sort alphabetically A to Z based on the name of the items.
sort.alphabetical_desc: Sort alphabetically Z to A based on the name of the items.
sort.type_asc: Sort type alphabetically A to Z.
sort.type_desc: Sort type alphatecially Z to A.
sort.position_asc: Sort by position numerically lowest to highest
sort.position_desc: Sort by position numerically highest to lowest
